metadata: (info { (description "This three-row mancala-style board game is attested on a statue of Shyaam a-Mbul a-Ngoong, ruler of the Kuba Kingdom of central Africa. It is the westernmost documented three-row mancala game.") (rules "Three-row mancala board with two stores. Three holes in each row?") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1516") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/sow/three rows/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Democratic Republic of Congo, from around 1750 to 1799.") } ) (graphics { (board Style Mancala) }) (recon { (concept "Sow" True) })
